attributes.title: BLM
attributes.review: This app took so long to download and it’s really pointless. My phone be acting up since I downloaded it so I’m assuming this app isn’t safe to have in the App Store.🍊🍊🤡

attributes.title: Don’t waste your time
attributes.review: This app works poorly and it’s slower than any app I’ve download, do not waste your time and storage on this

attributes.title: Just a review😉
attributes.review: Horrible I tell you. Horrible! This just hurt my eyes & heart. And what made it worse is I couldn’t any reason why “trump 2020” should even be a thing. How sad:(

attributes.title: SO OLD AND HORRIBLE!!!!
attributes.review: App is so crusty dusty and old I can’t even swipe without it glitching! This has made me switch my political views into a Democrat! #BIDEN2020 this man is a selfish man he can’t even update his own app! 👁👄👁

attributes.title: Awful App🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: just like everyone else i downloaded this app to keep up with our cheeto head president but he’s just too bad to look at.

attributes.title: This app ruined my life
attributes.review: This is a dangerous app. I downloaded it and it put a virus on my phone. Now every time I turn in my phone I hear a loud scary sound

attributes.title: MADE MY EYES EXPLODE😡🤬
attributes.review: This ugly orange Cheeto person showed up on my screen and made my eyes explode😭. I had to get surgery to get them back. I don’t recommend this app. I never want to see that again🤬🤬🤬😤

attributes.title: LOUD NOISES

attributes.title: Horrible. The worst app ever.
